tool_description: Extracts comprehensive metadata from media files including duration, resolution, codec information, and technical properties.

file_path.description: Path to the validated media file

error_messages: Metadata extraction failed: Unable to read metadata from the file.
Invalid thumbnail count: thumbnail_count must be between 1 and 10.
Thumbnail extraction failed: Could not generate thumbnails from the media file.
usage: Provide file_path of a validated media file. Optionally configure thumbnail extraction settings.

duration_seconds.description: Duration of the media in seconds (0 for images)

frame_rate.description: Frames per second for videos (0 for images)
